resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105124</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105124</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770204438</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">StreamWatch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">StreamWatch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">StreamWatch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">StreamWatch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">StreamWatch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">StreamWatch</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">StreamWatch</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This lesson is intended as a long term project to determine the overall health of a stream or wetland. Students identify seasonal changes that occur within the ecosystem, ideally with a minimum of bimonthly or monthly monitoring.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Lektion soll wie ein langes Bezeichnung 
Projekt die gesamte Gesundheit eines Stromes oder des Sumpfgebiets 
feststellen. Kursteilnehmer kennzeichnen Saisonänderungen, die 
innerhalb des Oekosystems, ideal mit einem Minimum zweimonatlicher 
oder Monatsüberwachung eintreten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette leçon est destinée comme un projet à long
terme pour déterminer la santé globale d'un jet ou d'un marécage. 
Les étudiants identifient les changements saisonniers qui se 
produisent dans l'écosystème, idéalement avec un minimum de 
surveillance bimensuelle ou mensuelle.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta lição é pretendida como um projeto a longo
prazo determinar a saúde total de um córrego ou de um wetland. 
Os estudantes identificam as mudanças seasonal que ocorrem 
dentro do ecosystem, idealmente com um mínimo da monitoração 
bimonthly ou mensal.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa lezione è intesa come un progetto di lunga
durata per determinare la salute generale di un flusso o di un 
wetland. Gli allievi identificano i cambiamenti stagionali che 
si presentano all'interno dell'ecosistema, idealmente con un minimo di
controllo bimestrale o mensile.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το μάθημα προορίζεται ως μακροπρόθεσμο πρόγραμμα
για να καθοριστεί η γενική υγεία ενός ρεύματος ή ενός 
υγρότοπου. Οι σπουδαστές προσδιορίζουν τις εποχιακές 
αλλαγές που εμφανίζονται μέσα στο οικοσύστημα, ιδανικά με ένα 
ελάχιστο διμηνιαία ή μηνιαία να ελέγξουν.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta lección se piensa como un proyecto a largo 
plazo para determinar la salud total de una secuencia o de un wetland.
Los estudiantes identifican los cambios estacionales que ocurren
dentro del ecosistema, idealmente con un mínimo de vigilar bimensual 
o mensual.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:B. CARL RUSH
FN:B. CARL RUSH
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>

          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>

          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>

          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105124</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>

    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/streamwatch</uri>

    </item>
  </manifestation>
